food.name: Leroy Burger
food.review: Finally a well seasoned patty, and they actually cooked it to my preference. This is a good go to burger... If you're willing to spend a bit.

food.name: Chicken Katsu Donburi
food.description: Standard katsu chicken donburi with noodles.
food.review: I can not stress how good this is for the price. Firstly, the chicken is not dry and actually tasty on the three accounts that I have had it. And the sauce adds creaminess and sweetness that rounds the whole dish together.

food.name: Big Papa Burger
food.description: Fried chicken, bacon, beefy beef patty, cheese, lettuce, tomato, aioli.
food.review: Okay, so this is a case of all show for me. The patty was tasty but IT WASN'T MEDIUM RARE. That definitely took the rate down for me. It's not worth that price.
